settings.label: Description
settings.default: Everything you need to know about the product and billing.

settings.question: What is the return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all purchases. If you're not satisfied, simply contact our support team to initiate a return.

settings.question: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide. Shipping times and costs vary by location and are calculated at checkout.

settings.question: Can I change my plan later?
settings.answer: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan at any time from your account settings. Changes take effect immediately.

settings.question: Is technical support included?
settings.answer: Yes, all plans include 24/7 email support. Premium plans also include priority live chat and phone support options.
